stylePromptTemplate: retro futurist protest poster, screenprint texture, light cyan and persimmon palette, {subject}, dynamic perspective, simple shapes, minimal text, 2025 dystopian satire

guidelines.tone: Keep everything set in 2025, readable by an average tech worker, and satirical without glorifying harm.
workflow: Each category has exactly one dedicated creative; own your lane end to end.
Open the relevant *_creative_prompt.md file for step-by-step instructions.
Claim the first item with status 'pending'. If none exist and the target count is not met, add a new pending stub before working.
Update the appropriate content file in content/ then run the validator script in scripts/.
Mark the item as 'done' (or add a completed record) here so the next agent skips it.
Validator scripts are locked; never edit them—your task is complete only when the corresponding test passes.
Datacenter author: run ./scripts/generate_datacenter_coords.py before validating coordinates.
